title: Ceiling Painting, "The Gods of Olympus", early 18th century
creditline: Gift of Mrs. J. Insley Blair
description: Canvas, an eliptical quatre-foil shape with jutting corners of a superimposed rectangle at intersecting points, depicts the Gods of Olympus, Jupiter, Juno, Venus, Pluto, Mercury, and Apollo with chariot and horses and winged putti.  Painted in flesh tones, browns and oranges, with accents of blue and green and high pink. Trompe-l'oeil frame.

tombstone.epitaph:
Ceiling Painting, "The Gods of Olympus", early 18th century.
early 18th century. oil on canvas. Gift of Mrs. J. Insley Blair. 1947-128-1.
